SELECT a.id, a.avatar, a.`name`, a.`level`, a.score, a.label, a.area_name AS areaName, a.mobile, a.email, a.unit_name AS unitName, a.agreements, a.create_at AS createAt , a.requires, a.attentions, a.success_total AS successTotal FROM t_tech_economic_man AS a WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( a.`name` like CONCAT('%',#{searchFiled},'%') OR a.`label` like CONCAT('%',#{searchFiled},'%'))
AND (a.province_id = #{addrId} OR a.city_id = #{addrId} OR a.area_id = #{addrId})
AND a.label like CONCAT('%',#{label},'%')
AND a.`level` = #{level}
AND a.`type` = #{type}
ORDER BY a.create_at DESC

SELECT a.id, a.`name`, a.`level`, a.label, a.score, a.success_total AS successTotal, a.avatar FROM t_tech_economic_man AS a WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( a.`name` like CONCAT('%',#{searchFiled},'%') OR a.`label` like CONCAT('%',#{searchFiled},'%') )
AND (a.province_id = #{addrId} OR a.city_id = #{addrId} OR a.area_id = #{addrId})
AND a.`level` = #{level}
AND ( a.`label` like CONCAT('%',#{techDomain},'%') )
AND a.`type` = #{type}
ORDER BY a.create_at DESC
SELECT DISTINCT a.label FROM t_tech_economic_man AS a
